character.name: Destiny
description: An enchantress. Can spend <c=status>SHARD</c> to empower her cards, and uses a variety of different <c=keyword>shields</c> with different effects.

MagicFind.name: Magic Find
MagicFind.description: Gives 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> and <c=downside>decreases by 1</c> at the start of every turn.

PristineShield.name: Pristine Shield
PristineShield.description: This ship cannot take hull damage. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of every turn, and whenever it negates damage.</c>
